text: also... it implies something about calling Rust code from dynamic languages - maybe?

elements.text: also... it implies something about calling Rust code from dynamic languages - maybe?

text: Yeah they've now built the libraries necessary for that! Before there was no way to parse and evaluate rust code from within rust itself. Now someone would just need to generate C wrappers for their library (fairly easy I think) and then we're good to go
